welcome_message: At least I'm a mini, digital version of Kathy.
I see that you are insterested in seeing my work. Hehehe.
I'll be here to provide you more information while you browse through my portfolio.
Oh I should take you to the next page. Give me a second.

home_message: Phew! Sorry about that. I'll be here the entire time. Feel free to broswe away now!

1: OMGGGGG. IT'S ME! You want to learn more about me hehe
2: Wanna know my fovorite movie? Everything Everywhere All at Once. I'm a big fan of absurdist media!
3: What have I been doing recently? Well, I've been taking acting classes since Fall of 2025.
4: Guess what? I've been listening to the Percy Jackson audiobooks recently!
5: Aren't I cool? Please tell me I'm cool. Hehehe.
6: This photo is from Fall Break 2023 when I went to Seattle for the first time!
